# tidyplus 0.0.0.9003

- Added `add_missing_column()`.


# tidyplus 0.0.0.9002

- Added `if_else2()` with only two options.


# tidyplus 0.0.0.9001

- Added `str_crush()` to remove all whitespace from a string.


# tidyplus 0.0.0.9000

- Added a `NEWS.md` file to track changes to the package.
